title: Worlds of IF (March 1969) (Modified)
creator: Galaxy Publishing Corporation
description: The writings of Lester Del Rey have been removed due to a request by John Betancourt of Wildside Press. Note: The story "Phoenix Land" by Harlan Ellison and an interview with Harlan Ellison have been removed from this online copy at the request of the author.
